grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 巧妙【コウミョウ】ingenious, skillful, clever, deft
巧拙【コウセツ】skill, workmanship, dexterity, quality
不精巧【フセイコウ】clumsy, bungling
kun reading compounds: 巧み【たくみ】skillful, adroit, dexterous, masterful, clever, ingenious, cunning
巧む【たくむ】to devise, to plot, to plan
上手い【うまい】skillful, skilful, clever, expert, wise, successful, delicious, appetizing, appetising, tasty, fortunate, splendid, promising
